akn:section.akn:heading: Report by Mayor concerning amendment, repeal, or replacement of Internal Revenue Code.

akn:content.akn:p: Within 90 days after any amendment, repeal, or replacement of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as that term is defined in ยง 47-1801.04(28A), the Mayor shall report to the Council of the District of Columbia concerning the amendment, repeal, or replacement. The report shall include, but not be limited to, an analysis of the impact of conformity to the amendment, repeal, or replacement on District of Columbia taxpayers, and on District of Columbia government revenues for 5 years thereafter, and a recommendation as to whether any change in District of Columbia law should be made as a result of the amendment, repeal, or replacement. The Mayor shall publish the report in the District of Columbia Register.
